translations: <正式>（使）减轻，减少；<法律>废除；消除（妨碍行为）；（指令状、法律诉讼等）无效

sentences.sentence: Steps are to be taken to abate pollution.
sentences.translation: 应该采取措施减少污染。

sentences.sentence: The demands of the north will not abate.
We must abate the noise in our big cities.
sentences.translation: 我们必须在我们大城市中消除噪音。
